channel.title: How to raise max hit with whip
channel.description:
i just need to know how do i change the max hit with a whip or any other weapon.. or how to add a ::max what tells u ur max hit with that weapon if any 1 nos plz say
i will be very grateful thanks

item.title: How to raise max hit with whip
item.dc:creator: @teh_war_of_noobs teh war of noobs
item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

yea, like delta said… in your source folder find another folder called config, in that folder find Item.cfg, find what ever weapon it is you want to change… the first 2-3 numbers are the amount you buy/sell it for, the rest of the numbers are the bonuses… probably what u want to change

Read full topic
item.source: How to raise max hit with whip

item.title: How to raise max hit with whip
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

Go to Item.CFG (server sided file) and then search for the Item you want to make stronger, Increase the SECOND LAST number in it’s Bonuses So that it can hit higher.

Read full topic
item.source: How to raise max hit with whip

item.title: How to raise max hit with whip
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Edit the stats of your whip from the configuration file ‘Item’.

If you increase the attack and strength stats, the max hit will increase as well.

Read full topic
item.source: How to raise max hit with whip
